title: Aleksandr Kolotilko
text:
Aleksandr Anatolyevich Kolotilko (; born 11 July 1979) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er.
Club career.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Neftekhimik%20Nizhnekamsk">FC Neftekhimik Nizhnekamsk</a> on 23 May 1997 in a game against <a href="FC%20Anzhi%20Makhachkala">FC Anzhi Makhachkala</a>. He played 6 seasons in the FNL for Neftekhimik and Anzhi.
